description: React component that renders a heatmap visualization using Plotly if available, with fallback to a placeholder SVG. It accepts various props for data, styling, thresholds, overlays, and metrics reporting.

methods.name: HeatmapView({ data, colorMap, colorRange, thresholds, overlays, units, zSlice, onRenderMetrics, })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a heatmap with optional Plotly integration and fallback SVG.

ctags.name: HeatmapView
ctags.signature: ({ data, colorMap, colorRange, thresholds, overlays, units, zSlice, onRenderMetrics, })

ctags.name: containerRef
ctags.pattern: /^    return <div ref={containerRef} style={{ width: '100%', height: 420 }} aria-label="heatmap-vi/

fields.name: return <div ref={containerRef} style={{ width: '100%', height: 420 }} aria-label="heatmap-vi/
